# covidExplorer

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

covidExplorer contains a Shiny app with summaries, analytics and news related to COVID-19. Download the package and launch the Shiny app to interactively browse data regarding the spread of COVID-19 in various countries.

## Installation

You can install the current version from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("etc5523-2020/r-package-assessment-petestylianos")
```
## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(covidExplorer)
## basic example code
```
